stimulusHtml: Let f be the function given by f(x)=ln(3-x) . The third-degree Taylor polynomial for f about x=2 is
choicesHtml: − ( x − 2 ) + ( x − 2 ) 2 2 − ( x − 2 ) 3 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4907@
